name: Dulce System ECOSYS13
description:
这里是美国新墨西哥州的道西基地（Dulce Base），现在被用于研发军用生物科技。你将作为一名道西系统的生态系统管理员，维护这个名为ECO13的人工生态系统。这个系统的大多数生物都被经过生物基因改良，因此很多生物并非普通生物，你需要格外小心。正因此，大多数任务操作你需要通过机器人进行。

使用WASD来移动镜头

使用鼠标选择卡牌（你需要科技点才可以使用卡牌）或切换卡牌视图

使用ESC重启游戏

Welcome to the Dulce Base in New Mexico, USA, dedicated to advancing military biotechnology. You shall assume the role of Ecosystem Steward for the Dulce System, presiding over the artificial habitat known as ECO13. The organisms within this environment have undergone extensive genetic modifications, rendering them far from ordinary. Consequently, heightened vigilance is required on your part. To this end, you will conduct the majority of mission operations via robotic proxies.

Navigate the camera using the WASD keys,

Utilize the mouse to select cards (technology points are required for card usage) or alternate card perspectives.

Press ESC to restart
